text: Æryst of stanforda ondlong sices on þone stan.
And þonan on þone ælrenan stob.
Of þam stobbe on mid þone mere.
Of þam mere in ycenan, up ondlong ycenan to cærssan wyllan.
Of cærssan willan in þone ælrenan stob, & þonan on þa hehan æc on wulluht grafe middum of þære æc to þæm wiðin bedde, & þonan to sic hlawe.
Of þæm hlawe to þæm lytlan hlawe & þonan to haran mere.
Of haran mere to orman ho & þonan to snaw forda.
And dune ondlong ea to þæm ælrenan stobbe.
Þonan to hwerfel dice swa þonan to wullafes wællan & to fasan dæles hyllæ.
And swa þonan to þæm ælrenan stobbe & þanon to þæm þyrnbedde.
And swa to cuppan wællan & to holan wyllan & eft in stanford.
And seo hid æt earnlege belimpeð into yceantune mid þissum gemærum.
Æryst of þære burnan in þone holan broc.
Ondlong broces on hwitan lege & swa on þone smalan hæð.
Of þæm hæðe in þone longan dic.
Ondlong dices in þone ealdan weg.
Of þæm wege in þa æspan & þonan in pocalege broc.
And swa ondlong broces in þa burnan.
Swa ondlong burnan eft in holan broc.
And an haga in wærinc wicum into yceantune.
And healf þæt land æt suðham innur & uttur on tofte & on crofte into yceantune.
Þis is þara XXV hida boc þe æþelred cyngc gebocode yceantun clofige his þegne a on ece erfe to geofenne & to geldenne ær dæge & æft dæge ðæm þe him leofest seo.
